channel.title: Showing interface whene you click on npc
channel.description: how do i make interface [code] showInterface(3559);[/code] show up when i click on a certain npc???

item.title: Showing interface whene you click on npc
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

  1. I saw the debate with trigger* lol.

  2. What didn’t work. I put some stuff in there and it fine. There’s a “Second NPC Click” and (I think a) “Third NPC Click” switch too. You might have to right click and press the first in the list, instead of just clicking them. IDK, mess around.

item.title: Showing interface whene you click on npc
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

hmm, let me look, I think theres a switch for this. Are you using a wL source? I’m not familiar with non-wL unfortunately.

K, Try this:
Search For:

case 155: //first Click npc

and somewhere in that case, IDC where, add something like this:

} else if (NPCID == NPC ID) { //Character Editor showInterface(3559);
I know you know java, but just a reminder, under this is a “else if” so DO NOT add a closing brace.

Hope that works.

Read full topic
